chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l1 ++ l2) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l2 i

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo _%list_scope _%nat_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
fast_OMEGA12 : forall (v2 c2 l1 l2 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v2 * (c2 * k2) + (l1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P (l1 + (v2 * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
fast_OMEGA15 : forall (v c1 c2 l1 l2 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c1 + c2 * k2) + (l1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P (v * c1 + l1 + (v * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
fast_OMEGA10 : forall (v c1 c2 l1 l2 k1 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c1 * k1 + c2 * k2) + (l1 * k1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P ((v * c1 + l1) * k1 + (v * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
cons_contiguous_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat) (a : entry), sorted (a :: l) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (a :: l) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i
fast_OMEGA14 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.neg x + l1 + (v * Z.pos x + l2))%Z
fast_OMEGA13 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.pos x + l1 + (v * Z.neg x + l2))%Z
fast_OMEGA11 : forall (v1 c1 l1 l2 k1 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v1 * (c1 * k1) + (l1 * k1 + l2))%Z -> P ((v1 * c1 + l1) * k1 + l2)%Z
contiguous_index_adjacent : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat) (a b : entry), sorted (a :: b :: l) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (a :: b :: l) i -> eIndex a = S (eIndex b) /\ eIndex a > i
contiguous_index_singleton : forall (i : nat) (a : entry), contiguous_range_exact_lo [a] i -> eIndex a = S i
removeIncorrect_new_contiguous : forall (new current : list entry) (prev : nat) (e : entry), sorted current -> uniqueIndices current -> (forall e0 e' : entry, eIndex e0 = eIndex e' -> eTerm e0 = eTerm e' -> In e0 new -> In e' current -> e0 = e') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo current 0 -> contiguous_range_exact_lo new prev -> In e current -> eIndex e = prev -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (new ++ removeAfterIndex current prev) 0
index_in_bounds : forall (e : entry) (es : list entry) (i : nat), sorted es -> In e es -> i <> 0 -> i <= eIndex e -> 1 <= i <= maxIndex es
contiguous_nil : forall i : nat, contiguous_range_exact_lo [] i
RaftInputHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => let '(handlerOut, state0, pkts) := handleInput me inp state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (handlerOut ++ leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftInputHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findGtIndex_contiguous : forall (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e entries /\ eIndex e = i) -> forall i : nat, x < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e (findGtIndex entries x) /\ eIndex e = i
findAtIndex_None : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> findAtIndex xs i = None -> In x xs -> eIndex x <> i
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
findAtIndex_intro' : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> findAtIndex l i = Some e
findAtIndex_intro : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> uniqueIndices l -> findAtIndex l i = Some e
removeAfterIndex_In_le : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i) -> eIndex x <= i
findGtIndex_sufficient : forall (e : entry) (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> In e entries -> eIndex e > x -> In e (findGtIndex entries x)
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), sorted l -> sorted (removeAfterIndex l i)
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> pli < eIndex e) -> findAtIndex xs pli = Some ple -> eTerm ple = plt -> pli <> 0 -> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
incoming_entries_in_log : forall (es log : list entry) (x : entry) (i : logIndex), In x es -> uniqueIndices log -> exists y : entry, eIndex x = eIndex y /\ eTerm x = eTerm y /\ In y (es ++ removeAfterIndex log i)
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list entry -> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
init_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) => mkRaft_data 0 None None [] 0 0 init [] [] false [] Follower [] [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data Arguments init_handlers {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
removeAfterIndex_le_In : forall (xs : list entry) (i : nat) (x : entry), eIndex x <= i -> In x xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i)
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
removeAfterIndex_covariant : forall (xs ys : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i) -> (forall x0 : entry, In x0 xs -> In x0 ys) -> In x (removeAfterIndex ys i)
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex_le : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), sorted l -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) <= maxIndex l
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope

```  
intros l1 l2 i H_sorted H_cont.
unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo in H_cont.
destruct H_cont as [H_monotone H_adj].
split.
- intros i' H_bound.
  specialize (H_monotone i' H_bound) as [e [H_index H_e_in]].
  apply H_monotone.
  apply H_e_in.
- intros e H_e_in.
  apply H_monotone.
  apply H_e_in.
```

original: intros l1 l2 i H_sorted H_cont. unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo in H_cont. destruct H_cont as [H_monotone H_adj]. split. - intros i' H_bound. specialize (H_monotone i' H_bound) as [e [H_index H_e_in]]. apply H_monotone. apply H_e_in. - intros e H_e_in. apply H_monotone. apply H_e_in.
